languages.text: "Прими мои извинения, благородн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан. Я был... непочтителен".

traits.locale_text: "Прими мои извинения, благородн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан. Я был... непочтителен".

languages.text: "Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."
languages.original_text: "Прими мои извинения, благородн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан. Я был... непочтителен".

traits.locale_text: "Please accept my apologies, noble Lord Captain. I have been... irreverent."
"Please accept my apologies, noble Lord Captain. I have been... irreverent."
"Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."
"Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."
"Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."

languages.text: “请接受我的歉意，我尊敬的领主舰长。我刚刚的话……缺乏尊重。”
languages.original_text: "Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."

traits.locale_text: “请接受我的歉意，我尊敬的领主舰长。我刚刚的话……缺乏尊重。”

languages.text: «Acepte mis disculpas, por favor, mi estimad{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán. Mis palabras... carecían de respeto».
languages.original_text: "Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."

traits.locale_text: «Acepte mis disculpas, por favor, mi estimad{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán. Mis palabras... carecían de respeto».

languages.text: 「大変失礼いたしました、偉大なるロード・キャプテン様。私の言葉は…敬意を欠いていました」
languages.original_text: "Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."

traits.locale_text: 「大変失礼いたしました、偉大なるロード・キャプテン様。私の言葉は…敬意を欠いていました」

languages.text: "Bitte akzeptiert meine Entschuldigung, geschätzter Lord Captain. Meinen Worten ... mangelte es an Respekt."
languages.original_text: "Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte akzeptiert meine Entschuldigung, geschätzter Lord Captain. Meinen Worten ... mangelte es an Respekt."

languages.text: « Je vous présente toutes mes excuses, très vénérable {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mes paroles... manquaient certainement de respect. »
languages.original_text: "Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous présente toutes mes excuses, très vénérable {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mes paroles... manquaient certainement de respect. »

languages.text: "Lütfen özürlerimi kabul buyur saygıdeğer Lord Kaptan. Sözlerim... Saygıdan yoksundu."
languages.original_text: "Please accept my apologies, my esteemed Lord Captain. My words were... lacking in respect."

traits.locale_text: "Lütfen özürlerimi kabul et saygıdeğer Lord Kaptan. Sözlerim saygıdan yoksundu."
